attributes.action: Sack Jeremy Hunt. Appoint a new Health Secretary and negotiate with the BMA.
attributes.additional_details: It's not too late Yet. Remove Mr Hunt, replace him with someone who is prepared to negotiate and re-open the talks with the BMA immediately.
attributes.background: Mr Hunt has stated that he will impose a new contract on Junior Doctors. He refuses to listen and uses bully boy tactics during negotiations. No Junior Doctor wanted this dispute but it has been forced upon them.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments. This includes calling for people to be sacked.

We already have a petition about reopening the negotiations:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/121262
